title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 207.11 - Award upon settlement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 207.11 - Award upon settlement

State Regulations

The commencement of the administration of this Part shall in
no way preclude the parties from setting the dispute on their own at any time
before or during an arbitration hearing. If the parties have settled, the
arbitrator, upon joint request of the parties, may set forth the terms of the
settlement in the form of an award. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
207.11

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
